import {useParams, Link} from "react-router-dom" import { useState, useContext } from "react" import { Context } from "../../Context" import ProductsInCart from "../elements/ProductsInCart"; export default function Cart() { const {cartItems, records} = useContext(Context) const sum = Object.entries(cartItems).map(([key, value]) => ( sum += records.filter(r => r.id === key)[0].fileds.Цена )) return (

Корзина
